original_text: Only let each person lead the life that the Lord has assigned to him, and to which God has called him. This is my rule in all the churches.
korean_text: 오직 주께서 각 사람에게 나눠 주신 대로 하나님이 각 사람을 부르신 그대로 행하라 내가 모든 교회에서 이와 같이 명하노라

sentences.original_text: Only let each person lead the life
sentences.korean_translation: 오직 각 사람은 자기 삶을 살아가되

sentences.original_text: that the Lord has assigned to him
and to which God has called him
This is my rule in all the churches.
